description: Welcome to Equiti Gate, a visionary development by Refine Development, strategically positioned on Sheikh Zayed Road in the heart of Downtown Jebel Ali. This prime location places you just a mere 10-minute drive away from the highly anticipated Palm Jebel Ali. Equiti Gate offers a lifestyle like no other, where every detail has been meticulously crafted to ensure the utmost convenience and comfort for its residents.
location: Downtown Jebel Ali, United Arab Emirates
